abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32278361, pmid32294345, pmid32293672, pmid32297590, pmid32297330, pmid32297932, pmid32293717, pmid32298029, pmid32297796, pmid32297851, pmid32294285, pmid32297903, pmid32294273, pmid32297983, pmid32294548, pmid32297868, pmid32293168, pmid32293753, pmid32293716, pmid32296886, pmid32297981, pmid32298018, pmid32297317, pmid32297980, pmid32297920, pmid32297540, pmid32294562, pmid32297900, pmid32293910
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.04.18
